allow:
Bash(powershell -Command "
# Download JUnit4
$junit_url = ''https://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=junit/junit/4.13.2/junit-4.13.2.jar''
$hamcrest_url = ''https://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=org/hamcrest/hamcrest/2.2/hamcrest-2.2.jar''

# Use Windows native download \(curl is available in newer Windows\)
curl -o junit-4.13.2.jar $junit_url
curl -o hamcrest-2.2.jar $hamcrest_url

# Verify downloads
ls -la junit-4.13.2.jar hamcrest-2.2.jar
")
